entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -32.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 12:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -32.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -38.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
